puzzle
Class Puzzle

java.lang.Object
  puzzle.Puzzle
Direct Known Subclasses:
Crossword, WordSearch
public abstract class Puzzle
extends java.lang.Object

The Puzzle interface used throughout the program. This includes prototyped methods that are defined in classes that implement this Puzzle interface.

Version:
3.0
Author:
Sad Panda Software

Nested Class Summary

          The list of all possible directions

generatePosition

protected abstract int[] generatePosition(int length,
                                          int colSize,
                                          int rowSize,
                                          Puzzle.Direction dir)
returns a valid start point for a word by length. Does not check intersections.

Parameters:
length - length of the word.
colSize - number of columns.
rowSize - number of rows.
Returns:
int[] - [0] is the x value, and [1] is the y value.
